long_desc: A gynosphinx sits here, befuddled by a riddle.
flags_raw: The gynosphinx is a crafty but gentle creature, having the body of a
stats1_raw: beautiful dark-skinned woman from the waist up, a feathery set of wings
stats2_raw: and the hind legs of a mighty cat.  Right now she is confused, having
stats3_raw: just heard a puzzling riddle from a cousin criosphinx.
